CustomField.description: Converts analysis completed dates into numerical values for graphical representation of the status.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Succession_Planning_Completed_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Employee_Development_Completed_Date__c) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Compensation_Completed_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Org_Communication_Completed_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Leadership_Completed_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Employee_Retention_Completed_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Employee_Engagement_Completed_Date__c) ,0,1)
CustomField.label: Analysis_Status_Calc
